Package egovframework.let.utl.sim.service

Class EgovFileScrty

  • java.lang.Object
    • egovframework.let.utl.sim.service.EgovFileScrty
  • public class EgovFileScrty
extends java.lang.Object
    Base64인코딩/디코딩 방식을 이용한 데이터를 암호화/복호화하는 Business Interface class
    Since:
    2009.01.19
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    공통서비스개발팀 박지욱
    See Also:
